short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily unsubscribe from all your subscribed to YouTube channels at once

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
*BUG FIXED, NOW WORKING*

Are your YouTube subscriptions getting out of hand? Tired of scrolling through endless lists to find the channels you want to unsubscribe from? Meet Unsubscribe Me!, the ultimate solution to manage your YouTube channel subscriptions effortlessly!

## Key Features:

- Bulk Unsubscribe: Say goodbye to cluttered subscriptions in seconds!
- Works Seamlessly: Compatible with all modern browsers, our extension integrates smoothly with YouTube.
- Regular Updates: Weâ€™re committed to providing continuous improvements and support for our users.
- Re-Subscribe: Change your mind? Resubscribe to the channels in **one** click!

## How It Works:
1. Install the extension.
2. Navigate to your YouTube subscriptions page.
3. Click on the **Unsubscribe Me!** icon and confirm your action.
4. Watch as your subscriptions disappear in an instant!
